'''Nimrodel / Procession / White Rider''' is a song by the progressive rock band [[Camel (band)|Camel]]. It appears on the bands second album [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mirage_(Camel_album) Mirage] released in 1974. The first part of the song titled '''Nimrodel''' is a instrumental and appears to reference the stream in [[Lothlórien]]. The third part titled '''White Rider''' is a description of [[Gandalf]].

==Lyrics==
<poem style="font-style:italic; margin-left:20px;">
When he rides, my fears subside

Through the skies his white horse flies

Once he wore grey
He fell and slipped away from everybody's sight
The wizard of them all
Came back from his fall, this time wearing white
He has a certain air
As if he's never there but somehow far away
And though he seems afar
Like a distant star, his warmth he can convey
